code: import{FETCH_ALL_USER,CREATE_USER,UPDATE_USER,DELETE_USER,CLEAN_UP,LOGIN_USER,LOG_OUT,UPDATE_PROFILE}from"../../../constants/actionTypes.js";export var getUsers=function getUsers(){return{type:FETCH_ALL_USER};};export var cleanUp=function cleanUp(){return{type:CLEAN_UP};};export var createUser=function createUser(user){return{type:CREATE_USER,payload:user};};export var loginUser=function loginUser(user){return{type:LOGIN_USER,payload:user};};export var logOutUser=function logOutUser(){return{type:LOG_OUT};};export var updateUser=function updateUser(user){return{type:UPDATE_USER,payload:user};};export var updateProfile=function updateProfile(user){return{type:UPDATE_PROFILE,payload:user};};export var deleteUser=function deleteUser(id){return{type:DELETE_USER,payload:id};};
